verses.verse: Then the inhabitants<WH3427> of Jerusalem<WH3389> made<WH4427> Ahaziah,<WH274> his youngest<WH9512> son,<WH1121> king<WH4427> in his place,<WH8478> for the band<WH1416> of men who came<WH935> with the Arabs<WH6163> to the camp<WH4264> had slain<WH2026> all<WH3605> the older<WH7223> [sons.] So Ahaziah<WH274> the son<WH1121> of Jehoram<WH3088> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> began to reign.<WH4427>
